title: Internet service provider market share in Vietnam fourth quarter 2013
summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Company, and Market share in each Company on the y axis.
The Market share is appeared to be the highest at Company VNPT and lowest at Company Others.
The difference of Market share between the highest and lowest Company is 50.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market share for 4 number of Companys.
The Market share is appeared to be the highest at Company VNPT and lowest at Company Others.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market share for 4 number of Companys.
Company VNPT has the highest Market share and Others has the lowest Market share.

Market share at Company VNPT is 56.6 , second place is  at 56.6, and thirdly is Viettel at 9.8.
